message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $140 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $125.  This is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $125, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you meet me there?
